Hype hipe

official KSP statement on FB:

> 
> Most of us are still sleeping, or just waking up actually! 7:30AM in Mexico

I'm obviously taking a break to post this (and more importantly, for coffee), but broadly, I'm sat at my desk working (because I would quite like to graduate come the end of June), with half an eye on Steam for a little green progress to start creeping across it.

I'm not sure how much work will get done today after that point.

> 
> I hope you are wrong and it'll be around 2pm cdt as usual

Why would you hope I'm wrong when 2pm CDT is about 6 hours away and the "Riddle Time" is about 2 hours away? Do you want it to be released later?

> 
> Of course it's probably going to be released during my 3 hour flight lesson today....

Good practice for the new aero!

I'll give the current time in my/SQUAD's timezone:

07:36 AM
I think I have a problem, I may or may not be at a stoplight on my way to work.
